channel.title: Can't connect to the website? Try this
channel.description:
I was excited to play the official server (when I finally got home). But to my surprise, the internet didn't want me playing:
[img]http://puu.sh/elJeJ/6c09a8277b.png[/img]
Oh no, I can't connect to the website! That means I can't play the webclient, or download the game client, correct?
[b]Wrong[/b]
With David's help (And me not even thinking of this), he told me to ping the page and see if it worked, and it did. So the DNS is just being a pain.
[b]Solution![/b]
Skip the DNS, and go to the page directly.
http://23.95.103.142/ = https://game.moparisthebest.com http://23.95.103.142/moparscape_client.jar = https://game.moparisthebest.com/moparscape_client.jar
Those that do use the webclient this way [b]MUST[/b] update their Java settings to allow the client on this IP address and [b]NOT[/b] https://game.moparisthebest.com See how [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667993.0.html]here[/url]

item.title: Can't connect to the website? Try this
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Eyeownyew:

it might (? I know nothing about web protocols) have to do with what dns servers we’re using. I think I’m using google dns right now

Yeah I was thinking a DNS flush or similar might be a fix… I just posted this for others in case they get ‘locked out’ like I did.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to the website? Try this
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Eyeownyew, post:4, topic:549093”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=668001.msg4467391#msg4467391 date=1420934550]

use game.moparisthebest.com not https://-

It forces https.
[/quote]
mine isn’t. and it’s working.
if i try loading https://- it doesn’t load, saying to reload. if i have the address as regular, it works completely fine (and there’s no security certificate information displayed in chrome)
[/quote]

Odd. Every time I went to it ( https://game.moparisthebest.com | game.moparisthebest.com | http://game.moparisthebest.com )
They all seemed to force me to jump into https…

Read full topic
